text: Hello! Thanks for joining today's system design interview. I'm excited to work through a problem with you. Before we start, I'd love to learn a bit about your background. What's your name?
My name is Sarah Johnson, I have 8 years of professional experience
Great to meet you, Sarah! With 8 years of experience, that's fantastic. What areas or domains have you primarily worked in?
My domain expertise is backend distributed systems. I scaled Netflix microservices to 100M users and built payment infrastructure at Stripe

Those sound like incredibly impressive projects, Sarah! Scaling Netflix microservices to 100M users and building payment infrastructure at Stripe are significant accomplishments.

Here's how today's system design interview will work: We'll start by clarifying the problem and gathering requirements, then move on to designing a data model and API. After that, we'll outline the overall architecture and deep dive into specific components. It's a collaborative discussion, not a test, so please feel free to ask questions and think out loud. The whole session will be approximately 45-60 minutes.

Are you ready to begin?
